Leslie KohLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered 5d agoI would say maximise the usage of the free overseas withdrawal as well as lounge access. However, those benefits are easily replaced by careful planning of your budgeting when travelling and free lounge cards that are given by your credit cards.0 comments2
